testsuite.name: com.grailsinaction.PostIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: Adding posts to user links post to user
Ensure posts linked to a user can be retrieved
Exercise tagging several posts with various tags
Ensure a user can follow other users
we can’t call Tag.addToPosts

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
tagMy.posts.collect {it.content} == ['Igorn post'] | | | | | | [Igor post] false | [com.grailsinaction.Post : 41] com.grailsinaction.Tag : 30

testcase.failure:
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Condition not satisfied:
tagMy.posts.collect {it.content} == ['Igorn post'] | | | | | | [Igor post] false | [com.grailsinaction.Post : 41] com.grailsinaction.Tag : 30
at com.grailsinaction.PostIntegrationSpec.we can’t call Tag.addToPosts(PostIntegrationSpec.groovy:99)
